description: Hot Seats provides the most delicious barbecue meals that you can ever get. From Steaks to Ribs, chopped with the finest knifes.
FAQ: 1. What is the best meal from the menu? --> We Strongly advise the Rib Eye or the Grilled Steak
2. Can i bring my kids? --> Yes, they can come and enjoy some meals we can provide them as well
3. Is it possible to get discounts? --> No, at the moment we don't have any special offers
